Html:
Hi,

I have an issue.

If I want to fire an event handler manually like MouseEnterEvent() or any other event, how can I do this?

I know this event (or any other event) will be triggered whenever the condition (Mouse Enter the object) is meet. But how can I trigger it manually in stead.

 

THank you

Please see the API documentation. There is a Trigger method for any InputDevice implementations.

Ohan
